body: I don't know the story cause I don't know mandarin but, I think it would be very cool if the blue one, after making the signal for her to shut, helped her to scape the other guys (he didn't like them, but still wanted to rape her) so after that, alone, he would use her to after become alies and defeat the other 4 antagonists (but still with him using her as a sexual slave after that with a touch of romance and friendship :))
